attributes.action: Introduce a MINIMUM speed limit of 60 mph on Motorways and duel carriageways to reduce the congestion caused when slow vehicles overtake other slow vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of the main causes of tailbacks on our roads is when lorries overtake other lorries and slow moving vehicles. If there is a minimum 60 mph limit on these roads, these tailbacks will be reduced

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
